#labels Phase-Deploy
== System Requirements ==

  *  Windows XP _(Untested on Vista, but should work)_
  *  .NET Platform Version 2.0 or higher
  *  Visual Studio 2005 or higher (if you wish to compile the source)


==  Installation ==

* 2 Methods:*

  # Download the executable, from the project downloads page, and run it.

  # Build from source:
       *  Get the FileNameCopy folder from the svn repository
       *  Open the .sln or .csproj file with Visual Studio
       *  Build the project
       *  Run the executable
